content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Wooden Chest at position(42.5, -81.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest (position 42.5, -81.5) with an inventory containing coal.

### Burner Mining Drill at position(42.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position 42.0, -83.0) which is currently working and has an inventory containing coal.

### Burner Inserter at position(42.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter (position 42.5, -80.5) which is currently out of fuel.

### Burner Inserter at position(43.5, -81.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter (position 43.5, -81.5) which is currently waiting for space in the destination.

### Stone Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) which is currently out of ingredients.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using inserters without fuel
- Ensure that inserters have fuel before attempting to use them. Check the fuel status and replenish as necessary.

### Errors when the inserter is waiting for space in the destination
- Make sure that the destination entity has space available for the items being inserted. Clear space or adjust the configuration of the destination entity.

### Errors when the stone furnace has no ingredients
- Ensure that the stone furnace has the necessary ingredients to operate. Check the inventory and supply the required materials.

### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Make sure to extract items from the wooden chest only when there is enough inventory space in the target entity.

### NAMESPACE

#### Utility Functions
- No utility functions have been defined or invoked.

#### Important Variables
- `coal`: int (total amount of coal in the wooden chest and other entities)
- `burner-mining-drill`: object (status and inventory of the burner mining drill)
- `burner-inserter`: object (status and inventory of the burner inserters)
- `stone-furnace`: object (status and inventory of the stone furnace)
